collectionPreRequestScripts: pm.sendRequest({ url: pm.environment.get('baseUrl')+'/user/v1/login',method: 'POST',header: {'Accept': 'application/json','Content-Type': 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'},body: {mode: 'raw',raw: 'u='+pm.environment.get('username')+'&p='+pm.environment.get('password')}},(err, res) => {pm.environment.set('ACCESS', res.headers.get('x-auth')); pm.environment.set('org', res.json().org); pm.request.headers.add({key: 'x-token',value: res.headers.get('x-auth')})});
